sentence.Network_en: In Alberta people mine and drill for oil, potash, petrol and gas.

sentence.Network_en: The most important use of potash is in fertilizer.

sentence.Network_en: Potash production in the United States was not developed until World War I.
sentence.Network_cn: 一直到第一次世界大战时美国苛性钾的生产才扩大开来.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from pot-ashes, from obsolete Dutch potasschen, originally obtained by leaching vegetable ashes and evaporating the solution in iron pots

entry.tran: 钾碱，草碱（一种从木炭灰中提取的白色粉状物质，有时用作肥料）
entry.def: Potash is a white powder obtained from the ashes of burnt wood and is sometimes used as a fertilizer.
